item.title: Sagara Community Felicitates Newly Elected Panchayat Leaders in Gadwal District
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In the first phase of the Gram Panchayat elections held in Jogulamba Gadwal district, several members of the Sagara (Uppari) community achieved significant success. Venkatesh Sagara of Jakkireddypalli, Devender Sagara of Chinnonipalli, Anjaneyulu Sagara of Gorlakhandoddi, and Paramesh Sagara of Maldoddi were elected as Sarpanches. Along with them, many others from the community were elected as ward members.
In recognition of this achievement, the District Committee of the Sagara Sangham...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh, Big Story
